# 题目

实现一个 `wrap_string` 函数，遍历给定字符串中的每个单词，如果当前行的长度超过了 `text_width::Int=10`，那么在末尾单词前插入换行符。提供给一个例子

```julia
function wrap_string(text::AbstractString; text_width::Int=10)
    lines = []
    start_index = 1
    for i in 2:length(text) # 从第二个字符开始，因为第一个字符可能不需要换行
        if (i - start_index) > text_width
            push!(lines, text[start_index:i-1])
            start_index = i
        end
    end
    push!(lines, text[start_index:end]) # 处理最后一行
    return join(lines, "\n")
end

# 例子
julia> wrap_string("Hello there this is a very long string that should be wrapped at 10 characters per line.")
"Hello there
this is a very
long string that
should be wrapped
at 10 characters
per line."
